data.value: Expiry Data Should be greater than or equal to Effective Date

data.name: lbl_WarningMsg
data.value: This is a Temporary MTA. The change is not permanent. Another permanent change may be required if the change is to be automatically applied at the next renewal, permanent MTA or cancellation.

data.name: lblBtnMessage
data.value: Please review the above and press submit.

data.name: lbl_BackDatedMTAForProduct
data.value: MTA Effective Date is prior to a previous transaction effective date. This function is not permitted.

data.name: lbl_BackDatedMTCForProduct
data.value: MTA Effective Date is prior to a previous transaction effective date. This function is not permitted.

data.name: lbl_BanckDatedMTAnMTC_NotAuthorised
data.value: You are not permitted to process an Out of Sequence MTA or Cancellation.</ br> Please contact your System Administrator.

data.name: lbl_BanckDatedMTAnMTC_WithNoClaim
data.value: You are not permitted to process an Out of Sequence MTA or Cancellation when there has been a claim on this policy after the effective date entered.</ br> Please contact your System Administrator.

data.name: lbl_DateAllowedForOutOfSyncMTAForProduct_CP
data.value: This Policy's product is not configured to allow an Out of Sequence MTA or Cancellation before the last Renewal or Inception Date.</ br>Please contact your System Administrator.

data.name: lbl_DateAllowedForOutOfSyncMTAForProduct_CPPlusOne
data.value: This Policy's product is not configured to allow an Out of Sequence MTA or Cancellation before the last Renewal Period - 1 or Inception Date.</ br>Please contact your System Administrator.

data.name: lbl_DateAllowedForOutOfSyncMTAForProduct_NA
data.value: MTA Effective Date is prior to a previous transaction effective date. This function is not permitted.

data.name: lbl_BackDatedConfirmation
data.value: MTA Effective Date is prior to previous transaction effective date.This will result in previous transactions being reversed. Do you wish to continue?

data.name: lbl_Msg_RenewalEvent
data.value: Policy status is Awaiting Manual Review .So automatic processing for backdated MTA is not possible.

data.name: lbl_Msg_RenewalTask
data.value: Policy status is Awaiting Manual Review .So automatic processing for backdated MTA is not possible.

data.name: lbl_vldMsg_PolicyUnderRenewal
data.value: Policy is under renewal. So automatic processing for backdated MTA is not possible.A work manager task and event is created for this.

data.name: lbl_DateBeforeCover
data.value: MTA Effective date is before original Inception date of the policy. Cannot Continue

data.name: msg_ConfirmPolicyUnderRenewal
data.value: This policy is in renewal. Please confirm that you will apply your amendment to the renewal version of this policy manually?

data.value: A Claim is linked with the Policy after the Cancelation Date. \nDo you want to proceed?

data.value: This policy is in renewal.\nDo you wish to proceed?

Creating this MTA Quote will result in automatic cancellation 
 of all existing backdated OOS MTA quotes for this policy.
